sqlMap.sql:
select fr.FIELD_RELATIONSHIP_ID, fr.CHECK_RECURSION, fr.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE, fr.SITE_NAME,
master.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, master.DEFAULT_LABEL as FLD_DEF_DEFAULT_LABEL, master.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, master.ENTITY_TYPE as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_TYPE, master.FIELD_INFO as FLD_DEF_FIELD_INFO, master.FIELD_NAME as FLD_DEF_FIELD_NAME, master.FIELD_TYPE as FLD_DEF_FIELD_TYPE, master.REFERENCE_TYPE as FLD_DEF_REFERENCE_TYPE, master.SITE_NAME as FLD_DEF_SITE_NAME,
detail.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, detail.DEFAULT_LABEL as SECONDARY_DEFAULT_LABEL, detail.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as SECONDARY_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, detail.ENTITY_TYPE as SECONDARY_ENTITY_TYPE, detail.FIELD_INFO as SECONDARY_FIELD_INFO, detail.FIELD_NAME as SECONDARY_FIELD_NAME, detail.FIELD_TYPE as SECONDARY_FIELD_TYPE, detail.REFERENCE_TYPE as SECONDARY_REFERENCE_TYPE, detail.SITE_NAME as SECONDARY_SITE_NAME
from FIELD_RELATIONSHIP fr LEFT OUTER JOIN FIELD_DEFINITION master ON fr.MASTER_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = master.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FIELD_DEFINITION detail ON fr.DETAIL_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = detail.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID where (master.SITE_NAME = #siteName# or master.SITE_NAME is null) and (detail.SITE_NAME = #siteName# or detail.SITE_NAME is null)
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FIELD_RELATIONSHIP (CHECK_RECURSION, RELATIONSHIP_TYPE, DETAIL_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, MASTER_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SITE_NAME) values (#recursive#, #relationshipType#, #detailRecordField.id#, #masterRecordField.id#, #site.name#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update FIELD_RELATIONSHIP set CHECK_RECURSION = #recursive#, RELATIONSHIP_TYPE = #relationshipType#, DETAIL_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #detailRecordField.id#, MASTER_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #masterRecordField.id#, SITE_NAME = #site.name# where FIELD_RELATIONSHIP_ID = #id#
